spec.name: ALESCO Garden
spec.description: ALESCO Garden (Jardin Alesco) is a substantial urban green space in Casablanca, covering an area of approximately 17.3 acres. It is a vital recreational area for the city, providing a much-needed natural retreat from the urban environment. The park is suitable for walking, jogging, and general relaxation, contributing to the quality of life for residents and offering a space for outdoor family activities. The name 'ALESCO' may refer to the organization or project involved in its creation or maintenance.

links.title: Jardin Alesco on Pacer Walking App
